overview: Volarte is a free flight through a computer generated Palace of Fine Arts, offering the murals of Rivera, Orozco, Siqueiros, Tamayo, Montenegro, Rodríguez Lozano and González Camarena. A novel view that allows to enjoy these works of art in their architectural context, in a way that's impossible in reality

production_companies.name: Consejo Nacional para la cultura y las artes

title: VolArte
